channel.title: FindText 'Chop' help
channel.description:
here is the part of the script that has the problem. i am trying to finish but this is pretty much the last problem plz help.
Procedure Chop; Begin Repeat if(findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor,3,3,515,336)) or (findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor2,3,3,515,336)) then Mmouse(x,y,3,3); Wait(200+random(100)) FindText('Chop') then Wait(1000+random(500)) Mouse(x,y,2,2,true) Wait(waittime+random(2000)) until(invfull) end;

item.title: FindText 'Chop' help
item.dc:creator: @FrostFyr FrostFÿr
item.description:
@FrostFyr wrote:

What is the problem with it?
Has Chop got the correct case if that function is case sensitive?

item.title: FindText 'Chop' help
item.dc:creator: @tigerskall tigerskall
item.description:
@tigerskall wrote:

here is the part of the script that has the problem. i am trying to finish but this is pretty much the last problem plz help.

Procedure Chop;
Begin
Repeat
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor,3,3,515,336)) or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor2,3,3,515,336)) then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3);
Wait(200+random(100))
FindText(‘Chop’) then
Wait(1000+random(500))
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
Wait(waittime+random(2000))
until(invfull)
end;

Read full topic
